title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 52.5 - Changes in approval requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 52.5 - Changes in approval requirements

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles in his discretion
reserves the right to alter or change the specifications or to require
additional or supplementary tests at any time. If any such test discloses any
unwarranted deviation in material, design, construction or performance, the
commissioner may revoke the approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
52.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
